name: Bad Neighbor
description:
Bad neighbor - this is a short story about the person who has to carry out the orders of gang's head under protest.

Because of a difficult life you had to join the bloodiest gang of the city. The gang's leader is known for his dispiteousness and cruelty toward the people.
You began executing his commissions doing the cruelest jobs. In such a manner you quickly earned the leader's respect. Elimination of competitors was the following job
but it was the ambush. The city police began massive arrest of bandits’ gangs forcing to lay information against gang and its participants.
You also have got a scolding, now you are a prisoner being charged with murder.

During the game you should carry out different orders of the gang's head, from punishment of the former participants of a gang to distribution of home-made electrical fuses in house.

Features
  • Hand drawn graphics
  • Interesting ganster story
  • Minimalist interface
  • Lock-picking system
  • Stealth mode
  • Various assignments
